snippet: House Republicans are trying to break the budget agreement and cut spending even more, which would prove that the House cannot be trusted to keep its word.
abstract: Editorial scores House Republicans for trying to break the budget agreement and cut spending even more; argues that reneging on the deal that set spending levels through 2013 will endanger vital social service programs and prove that the House cannot be trusted to keep its word.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans are trying to break the budget agreement and cut spending even more, which would prove that the House cannot be trusted to keep its word.
